senses.sense_definition: Of or relating to the Moon.

examples.text: The telescope revealed the stark beauty of the <w>selenian</w> landscape.
Early astronomers made detailed maps of the <w>selenian</w> surface.

senses.sense_definition: Containing selenium, especially when this replaces another element.

examples.text: The chemist synthesized a new <w>selenian</w> compound for the experiment.
They analyzed the <w>selenian</w> structure of the mineral sample.

senses.sense_definition: Of or relating to the goddess Selene in Greek mythology.

examples.text: The poem explores <w>selenian</w> myths regarding the night sky.
Ancient texts describe the <w>selenian</w> chariot driving across the heavens.
In the novel, the <w>Selenian</w> guided the explorers through the underground city.
The story depicts a conflict between Earthlings and a <w>Selenian</w>.
